ResearchProjectDef.label: Dirt on Stone
ResearchProjectDef.description: Turns out if you throw enough dirt on smooth stone floors you can grow plants on it. Who would've thought? Allows construction of Gravel terrain on smooth stones.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Fertilizers
ResearchProjectDef.description: If we bury green waste and manure it sustains the fertility of the soil. Allows construction of Soil terrain on diggable ground.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Sandtraps
ResearchProjectDef.description: It might not stop a Raider like it does a Golf ball but it sure as hell slows them down! Allows construction of Sand terrain on diggable ground.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced Fertilisers
ResearchProjectDef.description: Compound fertilizers allow us to enhance soil fertility as well as construct climate-specific soil types. Allows construction of Rich Soil terrain on already somewhat-fertile grounds, as well as Lichen-covered Dirt and Marsh terrains on diggable ground.
